devdoc.details: Isolated contract for MarketAPI interactions to avoid stack depth issues
devdoc.title: VeriFlowMarketApiHelper

ActorError(int256).notice: the called actor returned an error as part of its expected behaviour

FailToCallActor().notice: an error happened trying to call the actor

InvalidCodec(uint64).notice: the codec received is not valid

InvalidResponseLength().notice: the response received is not correct. In some case no response is expected and we received one, or a response was indeed expected and we received none.

NotEnoughBalance(uint256,uint256).notice: the smart contract has no enough balance to transfer

isDealActive(uint64).notice: Simple check if deal is active and valid

userdoc.notice: This contract handles all complex Filecoin MarketAPI operations
